Description: Secure Three-Tier Web Application Infrastructure - TapStack

PublicSubnet1Cidr.Description: CIDR block for public subnet in AZ1

PublicSubnet2Cidr.Description: CIDR block for public subnet in AZ2

PrivateSubnet1Cidr.Description: CIDR block for private subnet in AZ1

PrivateSubnet2Cidr.Description: CIDR block for private subnet in AZ2

DatabaseSubnet1Cidr.Description: CIDR block for database subnet in AZ1

DatabaseSubnet2Cidr.Description: CIDR block for database subnet in AZ2

KeyPairName.Description: EC2 Key Pair for SSH access (optional - leave empty to skip Bastion Host and Launch Template)

MinSize.Description: Minimum number of instances in Auto Scaling Group

MaxSize.Description: Maximum number of instances in Auto Scaling Group

DesiredCapacity.Description: Desired number of instances in Auto Scaling Group

VPCId.Description: The ID of the created VPC

InternetGatewayId.Description: The ID of the Internet Gateway

BastionSecurityGroupId.Description: The ID of the Bastion Security Group

WebSecurityGroupId.Description: The ID of the Web Security Group

AppSecurityGroupId.Description: The ID of the App Security Group

DatabaseSecurityGroupId.Description: The ID of the DB Security Group

ApplicationBucketName.Description: Name of the S3 application bucket

LoadBalancerDNSName.Description: Public DNS name of the Application Load Balancer

BastionHostPublicIP.Description: Public IP address of the Bastion Host
